Comment: All that was missing was a super cringy group a capella version of Imagine, like those twits did at the start of COVID.
Author: onemanmelee

Comment: When William Shatner took his Blue Origin flight, he and the other tourists were called passengers. These women were passengers.   When Alan Shepard flew this same orbit, it was heralded because Americans had never been to space before. Do we herald people who traverse the Atlantic non-stop? No! Why not? We heralded Charles Lindberg. If these women want to be more than just passengers, then do the hard work and do the training to become a real, contributing crew member.
Author: StillTruthSeeking
